SamPy.bolshoi.plotstellarmf.stellarmassfuncSinglePlot¶

SamPy.bolshoi.plotstellarmf.stellarmassfuncSinglePlot(path, database, redshifts, output_folder, outfile, mmin=8.0, nbins=30, nvolumes=15, lowlim=-4.9)¶

Plots a stellar mass function and compares to observational data.

Note :this function is horribly written, there several loops that are not really needed.
